text:
How hard would it be to wrap an existing python project (that is not a package) that depends on numpy, scipy + some coverage/doc-string dependencies/pip in Julia?
Can you link me to a simple of example which does turn python code into a Julia package?
The python code will need to call Julia Code.

Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>
